scripts.copy-js: rm -rf lib && cp -r src/ lib/; find ./lib -name '*.ts' -type f | xargs rm
scripts.copy-js-test: rm -rf lib-test && cp -r test/ lib-test/; find ./lib-test -name '*.ts' -type f | xargs rm
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-test
scripts.build-run-test: npm run build-test && npm run test
scripts.build-run-test-coverage: npm run build-test && npm run test-coverage
scripts.build-all-run-test: npm run build-all && npm run test
scripts.build-all-run-test-coverage: npm run build-all && npm run test-coverage
